source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_00<tab>Guildmaster Severian wishes to assign you a “minor” task.
target: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_00<tab>錬金術師ギルドのセヴェリアンは、何やらわくわくしているようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_01<tab>Although Severian has now accepted you as his assistant in truth, he feels the research for the ultimate expression of alchemy cannot continue until the constant flow of inconvenient guild tasks has been dammed. Speak with Deitrich, the guild's receptionist, and arrange for the guildmaster's official duties to be channeled elsewhere.
target: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_01<tab>セヴェリアンから依頼を受けた。ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドにいる「ディートリッヒ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_02<tab>You learn from Deitrich that Severian's obsessive research began after the Calamity took the life of his one true love. Considering the growing disapproval surrounding the guildmaster's actions and concerned for the man's well-being, the receptionist is initially reluctant to grant your request. He eventually suggests, however, that providing one of the guild's valued patrons with a fine-quality vial of hi-ether will generate the goodwill necessary to avoid further obligations for a time. Return to Severian and tell him the good news.
target: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_02<tab>ディートリッヒと話した。ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドにいる「セヴェリアン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_03<tab>After relaying Deitrich's suggestion, you find yourself assigned the task of creating an uncommonly potent vial of hi-ether. Deliver the completed concoction to Severian.
target: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_03<tab>セヴェリアンと話した。ウルダハの錬金術師ギルドにいる「セヴェリアン」に「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>」を1個納品しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_04<tab>You have delivered to Severian your remarkably efficacious hi-ether and earned the enthusiastic alchemist's glowing praise. With the threat of interruption to his research removed, the guildmaster states that he is ready to begin the final stage of experiments. The pinnacle of alchemy seems but a short climb away.

※The next alchemist quest will be available from Severian upon reaching level 40.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEQ_04<tab>セヴェリアンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>を納品した。納品すると、彼からその出来栄えを褒められた。冒険者という素晴らしい助手を得たので、次こそ「究極の錬金術」を行おうと意気込んでいるようだ。彼の助けになるべく、錬金術師として修業を積もう。

※錬金術師のレベルが40以上になると、セヴェリアンから次の錬金術師クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_TODO_02<tab>Deliver a vial of hi-ether <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Severian.
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_000<tab>Eagerly have I awaited your return, my able assistant!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_000<tab>待っていたぞ、助手！
ふふふ……そう、お前は「小間使い」から、
我が手足たる「助手」に昇格したのだ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_001<tab>Does your chest not ache with the intake of every excited breath? Do you not <var 1A 02 /var>tremble<var 1A 01 /var> in joyous anticipation as your hand reaches forth, seeking to nudge open the door into the realm of alchemy's most sought-after secrets?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_001<tab>どうだ、胸が高鳴るだろう？
共に究極の錬金術へ踏み出すとあらば、畏敬に震え
歓喜に咽び、三日三晩は眠れまい！

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_002<tab>You do? Well, try to ignore that feeling for now. Before we can fully commit ourselves to our research, there remain a <var 1A 02 /var>few<var 1A 01 /var> irksome details that must first be addressed.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_002<tab>だが、その気持ちはまだ取っておけ。
我々の快適な研究生活のため、先に片すべき仕事がある。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_003<tab>As ever, I speak of these <var 1A 02 /var>unending<var 1A 01 /var> orders from the guild. “Brew this potion!” “Concoct that elixir!” Ugh. Surely, you grow as weary as I of these constant demands on our precious time. We must be allowed to concentrate!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_003<tab>ずばり、錬金術師ギルドからの面倒な依頼だ！
奴ら、何かにつけて「働け！」と仕事をまわしてくる……
押し付けられるお前だって、うんざりだろう？

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_004<tab>I've an idea to end these nibbling distractions, and it involves <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>! March over to Deitrich's desk and petition for a complete cessation of these interruptions. I'd handle it myself, but...I fear the man's become unheedful of my words.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_004<tab>ということで、受付の「ディートリッヒ」に、
当面は余計な依頼を回さないよう、頼んでくるのだ！
私では相手にされんからな。ははは。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_010<tab>Hm? Master Severian demands to be spared from any further official guild duties? I am a simple receptionist─how can I possibly deflect the expectations of our senior members?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_010<tab>セヴェリアン様に依頼をまわすな？
一介の受付に、そんなこと頼まないでくださいよ……。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_011<tab>His obsessive research is wearing thin the patience of both colleagues and clients alike. I fear if we do not restore at least a <var 1A 02 /var>modicum<var 1A 01 /var> of goodwill, his attempts to redirect tasks will be met with the staunchest of opposition.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_011<tab>彼のなりふり構わない研究は、
ギルドの内外から、反感をかいつつあるのです。
挽回してもらわなければ、示しがつきませんよ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_012<tab>...I doubt our guildmaster realizes the precarious state he finds himself in. It is only his substantial skill in alchemy that convinces others to tolerate his growing eccentricity. That said, many would gladly trade that skill if it would return him to his former, somewhat less manic, self.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_012<tab>幸い、今のセヴェリアン様には、
周りを納得させられるだけの技術があります。
……それを差し引いても、昔の彼に戻ってほしいですが。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_013<tab>Nay, 'twas not always like this. But ever since the Calamity robbed him of his one true love, I have witnessed him transform into this feverish madman, desperately racing through experiment after experiment...
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_013<tab>ああやって研究に没頭する姿を、痛々しいと思いませんか？
僕には、彼が5年前に恋人を亡くして以来、
何かに追われて研究しているように見えて……。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_014<tab>Ahem... I delve into areas best left unexplored. We should return to the topic at hand. Of the various orders the guild needs met, the one of highest priority is a request for a vial of hi-ether, commissioned by one of our more valued patrons.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_014<tab>コホン。おしゃべりが過ぎましたね。
依頼の件は、「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>」1個で手を打ちましょう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_015<tab>I would suggest you lend your focus to this particular assignment, and create an uncommonly potent sample for delivery. Perhaps then, it would be enough to both satisfy the patron <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> allow enough forbearance to free the guildmaster of other tasks.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_015<tab>ギルドの得意先から頼まれている品なんです。
良いものを納められれば、
しばらくは追及を誤魔化せるでしょう。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_016<tab>I hesitate to encourage this kind of behavior, of course, but I realize what Master Severian's work means to him. And I...would be grateful if you could keep an eye on him. I fear for his well-being, and you are the closest thing he has to a friend.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_DEITRICH_000_016<tab>……セヴェリアン様のこと、よろしく頼みましたよ。
今の彼が頼るのは、唯一あなただけなんですから。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_020<tab>Well? Did you browbeat that Deitrich fellow into submission?
target: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_020<tab>どうだ、あの受付を説き伏せたか？

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_021<tab>Ah, a conditional surrender. I suppose a single vial of hi-ether is a small price to pay. But let it not be said that my assistant fails to deliver!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_021<tab>……ふむ、交換条件は「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>」1個か。
丁度いい。この課題は、いつも通りお前がこなせ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_022<tab>You will need to employ advanced─and somewhat involved─alchemical techniques to produce the elevated quality of hi-ether required. Best you begin at once!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_022<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>」を調合するには、
上級の錬金術を行使できねばならん。
お前ができる助手だと、今一度、証明してもらおう！

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_030<tab>How does your work progress? Have you succeeded in concocting that remarkably efficacious hi-ether?
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_030<tab>お前は、やればできる助手だ。
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>」を1個、持ってくるように。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_031<tab>Yes! Rejoice, my impressively adept assistant, for you have forged the key to our freedom!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_031<tab>……ふっ。
喜べ助手よ、お前のおかげで我らは自由だ！

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_032<tab>Who could not be moved by such a masterful example of mana-restoring splendor? Mayhap your post-assistant career lies in the manufacture of this wonderful substance.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_032<tab>これほどの<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　4556)) 01 /var>、誰も文句はつけられんだろう。
助手を引退した後は、エーテル屋でもやったらどうだ？

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_033<tab>You would, I suspect, need to purchase coffers that they might overflow with coin. Even among alchemy's more incredible inventions, the manufacture of ether stands out as a singularly profitable venture.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_033<tab>おそらく、大変儲かるぞ。
エーテルの発明は、錬金術師が成し遂げた偉業の中でも
ひときわ輝く功績とされているからな。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_034<tab>It is an innovation that changed the face of battle. Mages were no longer limited by their natural reserves of aetheric energy─a few swallows of alchemical brilliance, and a sorcerer could fuel another barrage of spells.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_034<tab>エーテルは戦いの様式を変えた。
魔力の枯渇という弱点を補われたことで、
ソーサラーたちは、活躍の場をさらに広めたのだ。

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_035<tab>It cannot, of course, sustain their powers indefinitely. As we have already discussed, any potion taken in excess becomes the equivalent of poison.
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_035<tab>かといって、飲み続けることはできんがな。
薬も過ぎれば毒となる、なんて
お前に今更いうことではあるまい？

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_036<tab>...Oh dear, was I lecturing again? It is difficult to contain my passion for alchemy with the goal of my labors looming so close on the horizon!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_036<tab>何にせよ、全ての懸念は消え去った。
お前の助力を得て、やっと悲願に手が届く……！

source: TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_037<tab>You have accomplished a minor miracle today, my dear assistant. With all obstructions to our research thus adroitly removed, let us move on to the final stage of experiments!
target:
TEXT_CLSALC350_00647_SEVERIAN_000_037<tab>このまま研究の最終段階に進み、
次回こそ、共に究極の錬金術を成そうではないか！
